title: Entertainment Live: Zayn Malik tops US chart - BBC News
summary: news and updates for tuesday 9 february .
zayn malik tops us billboard chart .
man banned from contacting the one show presenter alex jones .

documents.title: bye for now
text: so , today we learned that :
but one thing we still do n't know is why kanye west has chosen to call his new album tlop .
it may just be one of the mysteries of the universe .
enjoy your pancakes tonight if you 're having them and be sure to join us again at 08:30 gmt tomorrow for more of the same .
we 'll see you then .
author: Lauren Turner
Entertainment Reporter

documents.title: kim kardashian thanks ralph lauren for personalised baby outfit
text: and we 'll leave you with this .
most two-month-old babies do n't have personalised flying jackets made for them by ralph lauren .
but then , most two-month-olds are n't saint west .
kim kardashian has posted this of the outfit made especially for her son by the designer .
she wrote : `` thank you mr. ralph lauren for making saint this little jacket .
it 's so special !
we will cherish it forever ! # itsralphthough . ''
nice as it is , looks like it may be a tad tricky to clean

documents.title: fresh meat finale trailer
text: the first trailer for the final series of channel 4 comedy fresh meat has been revealed .
series four features the first new episodes of the show - about a group of university students - in more than two years .
the last series focused on the second year of the manchester-based students , with jack whitehall 's character jp now acting as the gang 's landlord .
a transmission date has yet to be announced so watch this space .

documents.title: matt lucas reveals vicky pollard inspiration
text: as we look ahead to bbc three 's move from tv to online next week , comedian and actor matt lucas has revealed who the inspiration was for one of little britain 's most infamous characters - vicky pollard .
and you may be surprised to hear it was a boy .
author: BBC Radio 4

documents.title: dua lipa : a pop star in waiting
text: dua lipa landed a place on the bbc 's sound of 2016 longlist and her new single , last dance , premiered on bbc radio 1 on monday night , accompanied by a surreal , magical video filmed in california 's rainforests .
want to know more ?
read our music reporter mark savage 's feature on the singer , who grew up in london and kosovo listening to david bowie , bob dylan and nellie furtado .

documents.title: musical tribute for lionel richie at grammy awards
text: a musical tribute will be paid to lionel richie at this year 's grammys as he is named musicares person of the year .
john legend , luke bryan , demi lovato and meghan trainor will perform some of his greatest hits , before richie himself takes to the stage for a rendition of one of his songs .
richie has won four grammys , including best album in 1984 for ca n't slow down .
legend is nominated for four awards while trainor is nominated for one , in the best new artist category .
the awards are taking place in los angeles on 15 february .

documents.title: greg james raises more than £ 100,000 for sport relief

but it must have given him a bit of a boost to learn that the total raised is now more than £ 100,000 .

documents.title: horrocks rocks at kiss me rehearsals
text: here 's a first look at jane horrocks in rehearsals for her new show at london 's young vic theatre .
if you kiss me , kiss me sees the ab fab star perform a selection of new wave hits by bands including joy division , the human league and the smiths .
described as `` part-gig , part dance-piece '' , the show will feature horrocks , a live band and four dancers .
if you kiss me , kiss me runs at the young vic 10 march - 16 april .

documents.title: three 's television swansong before online move
text: top gear , do n't tell the bride , gavin & stacey and siblings are among the shows which will feature on the last night of programming for bbc three on tv before the channel 's move online next week .
little britain and bad education will also air on tuesday 16 february , alongside an eastenders repeat , the mighty boosh , cuckoo , siblings , josh and some girls .
three will make its controversial move online on wednesday 17 february .
last year , a petition campaigning against the closure of bbc three , signed by more than 270,000 people , was delivered to the bbc trust .
stars such as matt lucas , daniel radcliffe , olivia colman and dj greg james have all spoken out against the on-air closure .
in november , bbc three controller damian kavanagh said : `` we have lots of new content coming in 2016 and exciting new ways of delivering it in development . ''
jack whitehall
jackwhitehall
nice that bad education will feature on bbc3 's last night on air .
let 's go out with a bang .

documents.title: made in chelsea star becomes fourth celebrity to leave the jump after being injured
text: made in chelsea star mark-francis vandelli has become the fourth person to leave winter sports reality show the jump after being injured .
vandelli , 26 , was taken to hospital after falling during the snow cross challenge on sunday 's show .
it was later found that he had fractured his ankle , a channel 4 spokeswoman said .
he 's been treated for the injury but wo n't be returning to the show .
fellow contestants beth tweddle , tina hobley and linford christie have all had to pull out because of injuries sustained while making the show , being filmed in austria .
channel 4 has said it would be reviewing safety procedures .

documents.title: jurassic park to be screened at royal albert hall - with live orchestra
text: the most recent outing of the jurassic franchise was last year 's jurassic world .
but fans of the original film will be happy to hear that it will be screened at the royal albert hall later this year - with a live orchestra playing john williams ' score .
the royal philharmonic concert orchestra will be performing , with the blockbuster shown on a giant screen .
the special shows will take place on 4 and 5 november .
two other spielberg films - raiders of the lost ark and et - will also be shown at the venue this year with a live orchestra .

documents.title: don mclean enters not guilty plea
text: american pie singer don mclean has entered a not guilty plea to a domestic violence charge in writing and will not appear in court later this month , according to his lawyer .
the next court date is 22 february but mclean 's lawyer , walter mckee , said nothing substantial will happen that day as he 's already entered a plea .
following his 18 january arrest , the 70-year-old was released from knox county jail after posting $ 10,000 ( £ 7,007 ) bail .
mclean and his wife later issued a statement through mr mckee saying they had `` agreed to move forward '' .
the us singer-songwriter , who lives in camden , maine in the us , has amassed more than 40 gold and platinum records worldwide during his career .

documents.title: $ 200,000 oscar goody bag anyone ?
text: there are just 25 lucky people out there who will land an a-list oscars goodie bag this year - so if you 're a nominee in any of the acting categories or a best director nominee , you 're in luck .
the rest of us will just have to wonder what might have been .
included in the bag are a hair follicle stimulant ( get the hint , boys ?
) , a walking tour in japan , a holiday in israel , an underarm sweat patch , protein bars , vodka , portion control plates ( does n't everyone in la use them already ?
) , personalised m & ms and a sex toy .
not to mention a year 's worth of car rentals and a so-called vampire breast lift - a new procedure which can apparently enhance cleavage without surgery .
ca n't imagine many of the best actor nominees going for that one .
read more .
author: The Hollywood Reporter

documents.title: hugh jackman has fifth case of skin cancer removed
text: hugh jackman 's has warned fans to wear sunscreen after having a fifth case of skin cancer removed .
the australian film star posted a of himself following the surgery on instagram .
`` an example of what happens when you do n't wear sunscreen , '' said the wolverine star .
the operation was to remove a common skin cancer called basal cell carcinoma .
read more .
author: BBC Newsbeat

documents.title: albarn and syrian orchestra to headline roskilde
text: damon albarn and the syrian national orchestra for arabic music are to open the roskilde festival 's biggest stage later this year .
albarn is no stranger to the famous danish music event , having played the festival for the first time in 1992 with blur .
this will be his eighth appearance .
the performance will take place on 29 june .
roskilde festival spokeswoman christina bilde said : `` currently , several european countries have shut their borders , and many people view refugees as a burden .
`` through music we 're trying to show how people can be regarded as resources and offer something to the new communities they are now a part of . ''
albarn and the syrian orchestra , whose members have fled around the world due to the conflict in the country , are also performing on 25 june at the royal festival hall in london .

but he joked that he thought man-of-the-moment matt leblanc , new co-host of top gear , would be the one getting the call

documents.title: 'carry on ' screenwriter norman hudis dies
text: norman hudis , who wrote the first six carry on films , has died at the age of 93 .
the london-born screenwriter started his career as a journalist before turning to film .
his break-out film was carry on sergeant , in 1958 , with second film carry on nurse becoming the uk 's highest-grossing film of 1959 .
it was based on stories he heard from wife rita , who was a nurse .
hudis moved to america after his carry on success and his us writing credits included the wild wild west and hawaii five-o .

documents.title: ellie goulding is 'scared ' about performing at the grammy awards
text: ellie goulding says she is scared about singing at the grammy awards , because `` america is just a whole other game '' - but insists she 's still looking forward to it .
she is nominated for love me like you do , from the fifty shades of grey soundtrack .
talking about performing for the music industry , rather than fans , she said : `` it is scary in that respect .
but i want to prove myself , and sing a song that i 'm so proud of , and so proud to sing and perform - so i 'm looking forward to it . ''
this year 's line-up also features adele , rihanna , justin bieber and lady gaga .

documents.title: dan walker named as new bbc breakfast presenter
text: dan walker has been named as the new presenter of bbc breakfast .
he 'll be joining louise minchin on the red sofa from monday to wednesday and replaces bill turnbull , who announced last year that he was stepping down .
walker , who presents bbc one 's saturday lunchtime show football focus and afternoon edition on bbc radio 5 live , said he was `` thrilled '' .
i have watched the show avidly over the years and am even looking forward to setting my alarm clock and doing what i can to make it even more successful .
it is an honour to be given this opportunity and to follow in the footsteps of someone like bill turnbull .
the man has significant shoes to fill so i hope i can do as good a job as he did waking up the nation .
he 'll be needing that early alarm call - and possibly a large mug of coffee - from 29 february .

documents.title: change to oscar winners ' acceptance speeches
text: and a bit more on the oscars - viewers may be pleased to hear that this year 's winners will be able to hand over a list of the names of people they want to thank .
the names will be scrolled at the bottom of the screen , rather than the winner having to remember to thank the whole crew and cast , their families and the postman .
they only get a 45-second slot , so this should mean they get to concentrate on what they really want to say in their moment of glory .

documents.title: professor green meets the 'hidden homeless '
text: professor green says his bbc three documentary on homelessness made him realise he had `` no idea of the severity of the situation '' or how `` difficult it is to get out of that situation when you find yourself in it '' .

in professor green : hidden and homeless , the singer - real name stephen manderson - meets people who sleep rough and also those forced to stay at hostels or sofa surf as they do n't have anywhere else to live .
you can catch the programme tonight at 9pm .
`` imagine having to sleep without any security .
you ca n't shut your door and feel safe .
you 're out exposed to more than just the weather .
read more .

documents.title: sylvester stallone considered oscars boycott
text: oscar nominee sylvester stallone says he thought about boycotting this year 's ceremony over the diversity row .
stallone , 69 , has a best supporting actor nod for his role as rocky balboa in creed .
speaking at the oscar nominees ' lunch , stallone revealed he 'd consulted creed director ryan coogler about attending the awards .
`` i said , 'if you want me to go , i 'll go , if you do n't , i wo n't ' , '' stallone said .
`` he said , 'just go there and try to represent the film . ' ''
neither coogler nor creed 's star michael b jordan , who are both black , were nominated .
academy president cheryl boone isaacs told the nominees that the lunch was to celebrate their `` incredible work on the screen and behind the camera '' .
alluding to the race row , she said : `` this year , we all know there is an elephant in the room .
i have asked the elephant to leave . ''
read more .

documents.title: gwyneth paltrow was 'stalked for years '
text: gwyneth paltrow has told a los angeles court that she feared for her own safety after a man sent her dozens of letters .
dante soiu is accused of stalking her over a 17-year period , with this court case focusing on letters sent to her between 2009 and 2015 .
in many of them , he said he wanted to marry the actress and also alluded to her death .
paltrow was on the stand for more than two hours , and cried while testifying .
read more .

documents.title: lena dunham takes time off with endometriosis
text: girls star lena dunham has pulled out of press for the new series , which kicks off in the us on 21 february on hbo , due to ongoing problems with endometriosis .
in a facebook message , she wrote :
hey beloved pals , i just wanted to let you know that , while i am so excited for girls to return on feb 21 , i wo n't be out and about doing press for the new season .
as many of you know i have endometriosis , a chronic condition that affects approximately 1 in 10 women 's reproductive health .
i am currently going through a rough patch with the illness and my body ( along with my amazing doctors ) let me know , in no uncertain terms , that it 's time to rest .
that 's a hard thing to do , but i 'm trying , because all i want is to make season 6 of girls the best one yet .
i 'm lucky enough to have support and backup from jenni , judd and the whole girls gang .
so many women with this disease literally do n't have the option of time off and i wo n't take it for granted .
wishing you all health & happiness , in whatever form suits you .
back soon xxlena
we all wish lena a speedy recovery .

documents.title: x-files : the reviews are out there
text: the first episode of the x-files reboot aired on channel 5 last night - and the reviews are in .
while this is relatively spoiler free , be aware that you might not want to click the links if you do n't want to know what happened .
sam wollaston in the guardian found the supernatural drama `` underwhelming '' and `` unnecessary '' .
it only got two stars out of a possible five in the telegraph , with patrick smith saying the episode 's title , my struggle , was `` an appropriate description of what it felt like to watch it '' .
neela debnath wrote in the daily express that `` the whole thing is a nostalgia hit but the following episode will tell whether this is one case that mulder and scully should have left closed '' .
the show , starring david duchovny and gillian anderson , had 3.4m viewers last night - second to itv1 's benidorm , which got 4.6m .

documents.title: eddie the eagle wades in on the jump
text: eddie 'the eagle ' edwards has said the celebrity contestants in channel 4 's the jump `` must bear the brunt of the blame '' for their injuries .
his comments come after three contestants had to pull out of the show after a series of accidents .
`` they signed up for this , they 're being paid for this .
if they are hurting , it can often be self-inflicted , '' he said in the daily mail .
olympic gymnast beth tweddle suffered a serious spinal injury on saturday .
it 's understood tweddle landed her jump successfully but then crashed into a safety barrier .
she is now recovering in hospital in austria following neck surgery .
she 's the third contestant to pull out of the show , after actress tina hobley broke her arm in two places and former swimmer rebecca adlington dislocated her shoulder .
read the full story .

documents.title: matt leblanc lands comedy pilot
text: matt leblanc - the man of the moment .
the friends and episodes star was announced last week as a top gear host .
but is that enough for him ?
no !

now he 's lined up a for a us comedy pilot for cbs titled i 'm not your friend , in which he stars as a freelancer who discovers that being a stay-at-home dad is more challenging than expected when his wife goes back to work .
it could come at a good time for the us star - the fifth series of episodes begins filming in april and is widely expected to be the last , although that 's not been officially confirmed .
the hit comedy , which airs in the uk on bbc two and on showtime in the us , stars leblanc as an exaggerated version of himself alongside tamsin greig and stephen mangan .
we 're sure top gear and the cbs pilot will keep him busy !
read the full story .
author: Deadline Hollywood

documents.title: kanye west changes the title of his album again
text: he 's a bit indecisive , that kanye west .
first , his album was going to be called so help me god .
then , last may , he changed it to swish .
but that did n't sound quite right to kanye either , as he then decided to go for waves .
finally , today , he tweeted that it 's going to be called tlop .
it will be his first studio album since yeezus in 2013 .
and as kanye says , there are prizes for anyone who guesses what it means .
suggestions on twitter include `` the love of potatoes '' and `` the last one , promise '' .
if you have any ( clean ) suggestions , do let us know

documents.title: terry wogan celebrated in radio times
text: the latest issue of the radio times celebrates terry wogan with a tribute from lifelong friend henry kelly - and reveals david attenborough turned him down as a bbc two presenter in 1965 .
the issue also features all of his 17 radio times covers .
sir terry died last month from cancer .
his funeral will be held this week .

documents.title: zayn malik 's pillowtalk lands us number one
text: former one direction member zayn malik - now known simply as zayn - is celebrating after entering the billboard hot 100 at number one with his debut solo single pillowtalk .
it 's his highest chart placing , having managed number two as part of 1d with the group 's 2013 single best song ever .
pillowtalk is only the 25th song ever to debut at number one on the hot 100 .
zayn is also the first uk artist to debut at number one on the hot 100 with a first single .
he 's the third uk act to debut at the top of the us chart , following adele 's hello last year and elton john 's candle in the wind in 1997 .
the boy from bradford did good !
author: Billboard magazine

documents.title: oscar nominees lunch : class photo released
text: if you fancy a bit of a challenge for a tuesday morning , try spotting who 's who in this `` class photo '' taken at the oscar nominees lunch at the beverly hilton hotel in los angeles .

if you need some helpful tips , the first row features mark ruffalo and bryan cranston , while matt damon and saoirse ronan are in the second row , lady gaga and charlotte rampling are in the row behind them , the fourth row features leonardo dicaprio and sam smith , while the weeknd , alejandro gonzalez inarritu , sylvester stallone and eddie redmayne are in the back row .
it 's just impressive they 've all got their eyes open and are looking in the right direction - nothing like a ty school photo at all , then .
we 'll be bringing you news from the lunch , including which nominee considered boycotting the ceremony over the diversity row .

documents.title: get involved
text: there 's been a review into safety procedures on reality tv show the jump - but what do you think ?
is it simply too dangerous or do the celebrities bear the brunt of the blame , as eddie the eagle has suggested ?

we want to hear your views on this - and anything else happening in the world of arts and entertainment you feel strongly about - so do get in touch by tweeting @ bbcnewsents or email us entertainment.news @ bbc.co.uk .

documents.title: man banned from contacting one show 's alex jones
text: a fan who bombarded the one show host alex jones with tweets , declaring he was in love with her , has been banned from contacting the presenter .
shane goldsmith , 44 , sent jones messages over a 17-month period and also waited for her outside the bbc 's new broadcasting house .
a judge imposed a restraining order which also bans goldsmith from having contact with jones 's partner or parents or from going to any place where jones lives or works .
goldsmith was formally cleared of a single charge of harassment .
read more .

documents.title: good morning
text: welcome once again to the entertainment and arts live page - stick with us today as we bring you all the latest on channel 4 show the jump , gregathlon - radio 1 's greg james 's sport relief challenge which continues in cardiff today - and chart news on zayn malik .
plus all the rest of the day 's news as it happens .
do n't go away !
author: Emma Saunders
Entertainment reporter
